short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome extension for monitoring cryptocurrency prices and sending alerts to with AI report analysis.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
AI Crypto Price Notifier is designed to help you keep track of cryptocurrency prices and receive instant notifications. It leverages advanced AI analysis to provide comprehensive reports and real-time updates on the market's most critical metrics.
